GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 22 December 2024.

S
howers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Southern and Uva provinces and in Rathnapura
district during the evening or night. Mainly fair weather will prevail elsewhere.

M
isty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central, Southern, and Uva
provinces during the morning.

T
he general public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by
temporary localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
